instruction: Generate a 5-question multiple choice quiz about World War II in JSON format.

questions.question: When did World War II start?
questions.hint: The war began with Germany's invasion of Poland

questions.question: Who was the leader of Nazi Germany?
questions.hint: He was the leader of the Nazi Party and Chancellor of Germany

questions.question: What event caused the USA to enter the war?
questions.hint: Japanese attack on a US naval base in Hawaii

questions.question: Which country was invaded first by Germany?
questions.hint: This invasion on September 1, 1939 marked the start of WWII

questions.question: What was the code name for the Normandy landings?
questions.hint: The largest seaborne invasion in history

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 3 questions about Python programming.

questions.question: What keyword is used to define a function in Python?
questions.hint: A three-letter keyword that stands for 'define'

questions.question: Which data type is immutable?
questions.hint: This data type uses parentheses () and cannot be modified after creation

questions.question: What symbol is used to comment a line in Python?
questions.hint: Also known as the pound or hash symbol

instruction: Generate a 4-question multiple choice quiz about the Solar System in JSON format.

questions.question: Which planet is closest to the Sun?
questions.hint: Named after the Roman messenger god

questions.question: What is the largest planet in our Solar System?
questions.hint: Named after the king of the Roman gods

questions.question: Which planet has a prominent ring system?
questions.hint: Its rings are made mostly of ice and rock

questions.question: What is the name of Earth's natural satellite?
questions.hint: The only celestial body humans have walked on

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 5 questions about Ancient Egypt.

questions.question: Who was the boy king whose tomb was discovered in 1922?
questions.hint: Also known as King Tut

questions.question: What river was central to Ancient Egyptian civilization?
questions.hint: The longest river in the world

questions.question: What was the primary writing system of Ancient Egypt?
questions.hint: Picture-based writing system deciphered using the Rosetta Stone

questions.question: Which structure is considered the largest pyramid?
questions.hint: Also known as the Great Pyramid of Giza

questions.question: Who was the last pharaoh of Egypt?
questions.hint: She allied with Julius Caesar and Mark Antony

instruction: Generate a 3-question quiz about JavaScript programming in JSON format.

questions.question: Which keyword declares a variable with block scope?
questions.hint: Introduced in ES6 as a more secure alternative to var

questions.question: What is the output of 'typeof null'?
questions.hint: A known quirk in JavaScript, considered a bug by many

questions.question: Which method adds an element to the end of an array?
questions.hint: The opposite of pop()

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 4 questions about the American Civil War.

questions.question: In which year did the American Civil War begin?
questions.hint: The war began with the Battle of Fort Sumter

questions.question: Who was the president of the United States during the Civil War?
questions.hint: Known as the Great Emancipator

questions.question: What was the first major battle of the Civil War?
questions.hint: Also known as the Battle of Manassas

questions.question: Which document abolished slavery in the United States?
questions.hint: A Constitutional amendment ratified in 1865

instruction: Generate a 5-question multiple choice quiz about the Periodic Table in JSON format.

questions.question: What is the chemical symbol for Gold?
questions.hint: Derived from the Latin word 'aurum'

questions.question: Which element has the atomic number 1?
questions.hint: The lightest and most abundant element in the universe

questions.question: Which gas is the second most abundant element in the universe?
questions.hint: Named after the Greek word for the Sun

questions.question: What is the most reactive group in the Periodic Table?
questions.hint: Located in Group 1 of the periodic table

questions.question: Which element is a liquid at room temperature?
questions.hint: Also known as quicksilver

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 3 questions about Renaissance Art.

questions.question: Who painted the Mona Lisa?
questions.hint: This artist was also a renowned inventor and scientist

questions.question: Which artist created the frescoes in the Sistine Chapel?
questions.hint: He spent four years painting the chapel ceiling

questions.question: What is the name of Botticelli's famous painting depicting a mythological birth?
questions.hint: Shows the goddess of love emerging from the sea

instruction: Generate a 4-question multiple choice quiz about Artificial Intelligence in JSON format.

questions.question: What is the term for AI systems that can perform tasks without human intervention?
questions.hint: Systems that operate independently

questions.question: Which algorithm is commonly used for image recognition?
questions.hint: Designed to process pixel data in layers

questions.question: What is the primary goal of reinforcement learning?
questions.hint: Learning through trial and error with feedback

questions.question: Which company developed the AI model Watson?
questions.hint: Famous for winning at Jeopardy!

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 5 questions about Classical Music.

questions.question: Who composed the 'Symphony No. 9' in D minor?
questions.hint: Contains the 'Ode to Joy'

questions.question: Which instrument is central to Vivaldi's 'The Four Seasons'?
questions.hint: Vivaldi was a virtuoso of this instrument

questions.question: What is the nickname of Mozart's Symphony No. 41?
questions.hint: Named after the Roman king of gods

questions.question: Who is known for the opera 'The Marriage of Figaro'?
questions.hint: Based on a play by Beaumarchais

questions.question: Which composer is associated with the Baroque period?
questions.hint: Known for his Brandenburg Concertos

instruction: Generate a 3-question multiple choice quiz about the French Revolution in JSON format.

questions.question: In which year did the French Revolution begin?
questions.hint: The year of the storming of the Bastille

questions.question: Who was the king of France at the start of the Revolution?
questions.hint: Married to Marie Antoinette

questions.question: What was the name of the prison stormed by revolutionaries?
questions.hint: A symbol of royal authority and oppression

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 4 questions about Data Structures.

questions.question: Which data structure follows the Last In, First Out (LIFO) principle?
questions.hint: Think of a stack of plates

questions.question: What is the time complexity of searching in a balanced binary search tree?
questions.hint: Each comparison eliminates half of the remaining nodes

questions.question: Which data structure is used to implement a priority queue?
questions.hint: A specialized tree-based structure

questions.question: What is the main advantage of a linked list over an array?
questions.hint: Can grow or shrink during runtime

instruction: Generate a 5-question multiple choice quiz about Greek Mythology in JSON format.

questions.question: Who was the king of the gods in Greek mythology?
questions.hint: God of thunder and lightning

questions.question: What creature is half man, half bull?
questions.hint: Lived in the Labyrinth of Crete

questions.question: Who was the goddess of wisdom?
questions.hint: Patron goddess of Athens

questions.question: What was the name of the hero who killed Medusa?
questions.hint: Used a mirrored shield to avoid her gaze

questions.question: What is the name of the river that separates the living from the underworld?
questions.hint: Gods swore unbreakable oaths by this river

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 3 questions about Quantum Physics.

questions.question: Who proposed the uncertainty principle?
questions.hint: States that position and momentum cannot be precisely measured simultaneously

questions.question: What is the term for particles that can exist in multiple states simultaneously?
questions.hint: Famously illustrated by Schrödinger's cat thought experiment

questions.question: Which equation describes the wave function of a quantum system?
questions.hint: Fundamental equation of quantum mechanics

instruction: Generate a 4-question multiple choice quiz about the Industrial Revolution in JSON format.

questions.question: In which century did the Industrial Revolution begin?
questions.hint: Started in Britain around 1760

questions.question: What was the primary source of power for early factories?
questions.hint: Steam engines revolutionized manufacturing

questions.question: Who invented the spinning jenny?
questions.hint: A multi-spindle spinning frame

questions.question: Which industry was revolutionized by the cotton gin?
questions.hint: Made cotton processing much faster

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 5 questions about Shakespearean Plays.

questions.question: Which play features the character Hamlet?
questions.hint: Set in Denmark

questions.question: Who is the protagonist of 'Romeo and Juliet'?
questions.hint: A young man from the Montague family

questions.question: What is the setting of 'A Midsummer Night's Dream'?
questions.hint: Features fairies in a magical forest

questions.question: Which play is known as the 'Scottish Play'?
questions.hint: Features three witches

questions.question: Who is the villain in 'Othello'?
questions.hint: Othello's trusted but deceitful advisor

instruction: Generate a 3-question multiple choice quiz about Machine Learning in JSON format.

questions.question: Which type of learning uses labeled data?
questions.hint: Training data includes correct answers

questions.question: What is the purpose of a loss function?
questions.hint: Quantifies the difference between predictions and actual values

questions.question: Which algorithm is used for clustering?
questions.hint: Groups data into K number of clusters

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 4 questions about the Roman Empire.

questions.question: Who was the first Roman Emperor?
questions.hint: Born as Octavian, adopted son of Julius Caesar

questions.question: What was the name of the Roman gladiatorial arena?
questions.hint: Also known as the Flavian Amphitheatre

questions.question: Which emperor built a wall in Britain?
questions.hint: The wall marked the northernmost boundary of Roman Britain

questions.question: What was the official language of the Roman Empire?
questions.hint: The ancestor of Romance languages

instruction: Generate a 5-question multiple choice quiz about Marine Biology in JSON format.

questions.question: What is the largest animal ever known to live on Earth?
questions.hint: Can grow up to 100 feet long

questions.question: Which marine animal is known for its ability to change color?
questions.hint: Has special cells called chromatophores

questions.question: What is the primary food source for coral reefs?
questions.hint: Lives symbiotically within coral polyps

questions.question: Which ocean is the largest?
questions.hint: Covers about one-third of Earth's surface

questions.question: What type of marine animal is a sea cucumber?
questions.hint: Related to starfish and sea urchins

instruction: Generate a JSON quiz with 3 questions about the Theory of Relativity.

questions.question: Who developed the Theory of Relativity?
questions.hint: Published the Special Theory of Relativity in 1905

questions.question: What does the equation E=mc^2 represent?
questions.hint: Shows that mass and energy are interchangeable

questions.question: What is the primary effect of special relativity?
questions.hint: Time moves slower at higher velocities
